update ezs_customized
addTime = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deleteStatus = #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=BIT},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ashContent = #{ashContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attr1 = #{attr1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attr2 = #{attr2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attr3 = #{attr3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

combustionGrade = #{combustionGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

flexuralModulus = #{flexuralModulus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isEp = #{isEp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.select: SELECT A.id, A.sourceType, A.addTime, A.preNum, A.status, IFNULL(B.`name`,C.`name`) cname FROM ezs_customized A LEFT JOIN ezs_goods B ON A.goods_id = B.id LEFT JOIN ezs_goods_class C ON A.category_id=C.id WHERE A.purchaser_id= #{userId} ORDER BY A.addTime desc limit #{pageCount},#{pageSize}

SELECT A.id, IFNULL(A.sourceType, '') source_type, A.addTime, IFNULL(A.preNum, 0) pre_num, A.proName cname, IFNULL(C.`name`, '') NAME, IFNULL(A.preTime, null) pre_time, IFNULL(A.remark, '') remark, IFNULL(D1.`name`, '') colour, IFNULL(D2.`name`, '') shape, IFNULL(A.sourcefrom, '') sourcefrom, IFNULL(A.purpose, '') purpose, IFNULL(A.isEp, '') is_ep, IFNULL(A.waterContent, '0') water_content, IFNULL(A.density, '0') density, IFNULL(A.meltindex, '0') meltindex, IFNULL(A.ashcontent, '0') ash_content, IFNULL(A.xbforce, '0') xbforce, IFNULL(A.jzforce, '0') jzforce, IFNULL(A.tensile, '0') tensile, IFNULL(A.elongbreak, '0') elong_break, IFNULL(C.`name`, '') catname, IFNULL(A.budget, 0) budget, IFNULL(A.flexuralmodulus, '0') flexural_modulus, IFNULL(A.combustiongrade, '0') combustion_grade, IFNULL(A.bendstrength, '0') bend_strength, IFNULL(A.`status`, '0') `status`, A.colour_id, A.shape_id FROM ezs_customized A LEFT JOIN ezs_goods B ON A.goods_id = B.id LEFT JOIN ezs_goods_class C ON A.category_id = C.id LEFT JOIN ezs_dict D1 ON A.colour_id = D1.id LEFT JOIN ezs_dict D2 ON A.shape_id = D2.id WHERE A.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
